Some exploratory visualisations for [Transatlantic Intellectual Networks](https://research.ncl.ac.uk/atnu/projects/transatlanticintellectualnetworks/) (2020), a pilot project on the correspondence of [David Bailie Warden (1772-1845)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Bailie_Warden).
